CHAT.comment: This visit took place just after M and WW had breakfast. They spend most of the visit outside where WW wants to play with his friends, but his one friend (XingXing) hasn't come out yet. On their second trip outside, WW ends up playing in the sand while M talks to an older woman from the neighbouring apartment building. The older woman has a 6+8 month old grandchild who she has in a stroller while she is outside talking with WW's mother. WW has some brief (mostly nonverbal) interactions with this child towards the end of the visit.

WW's mother only has a 5th grade education and does not work full-time, so is the primary caregiver for WW. His father works in a factory as a welder and they live in a factory-provided low-rise apartment building.

clause.a: cries loudly for 3.0 and another 3.0; ww pushes m's legs
ww walks to door then drinks
chirping of cicadas; coughs; ww in haocway
ww in haocway, chirping of cicadas
ww stioc in haocway, cicadas, m goes to haocway
m goes into kitchen and rinses ww's bottle
m foocows ww out into haocway, stands over ww
banging sounds of pot as m puts sugar in bottle
m walks back to near ww
m putting more water in bottle for ww
cicadas and noise of ww manipulating bottle
